function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of security layers in urban environments to combat future pandemics","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to future pandemics","Mitigation":"Incorporating additional security layers in urban environments","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, contactless technology, and smart building designs","People":"Urban residents, workers, and visitors","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of architectural and urban design on the experience of gated community residents during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Differing experiences and vulnerabilities of gated community residents compared to non-gated communities","Mitigation":"Adopting designs that enhance safety and minimize contagion risks","Technologies":"Smart building designs, contactless technology, and advanced sanitation systems","People":"Gated community residents, non-gated community residents, and urban planners","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and gated community management"},{"Description":"Factors influencing resident preferences for gated communities during pandemics","Impact":"Increased demand for gated communities leading to unequal access to safe environments","Mitigation":"Addressing social equity and providing safe environments for all residents, regardless of community type","Technologies":"Community health monitoring systems, equitable distribution of resources, and inclusive community planning","People":"Residents, urban planners, and policymakers","Owner":"Community developers, urban planners, and policymakers"}]}
